titleStmt.title: The marchants avizo Very necessarie for their sonnes and seruants, when they first send them beyond the seas, as to Spaine and Portingale or other countreyes. Made by their hartie wellwiller in Christ. I.B. marchant.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Browne), 1526?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Field for William Norton, dwelling in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Queenes armes,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The marchants auizo.
Caption title on p. 1: A generall remembrance for a servant when he first trauelleth to the sea, as to Spaine or Portingale, or other countreys.
Reproduction of original in the St. John's College Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Queenes armes
